title: Social Engagement Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want personalized event suggestions based on my interests and availability, so that I can stay socially engaged without feeling monitored or overwhelmed.

title: Scheduled Video Calls with Family Members
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to easily schedule and initiate video calls with my family members so that I can maintain my social connections without feeling monitored or overwhelmed by technology.

title: Interest-Based Community Interaction – Connecting Users with Similar Hobbies
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to connect with others who share my interests in cycling and woodworking so that I can engage in meaningful activities without feeling monitored.

title: Memory Lane Features – Storytelling Prompts for Shared Experiences
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want prompts for storytelling that encourage sharing experiences with my family, so that I can maintain connections and participate in family activities without feeling monitored.

title: Voice-to-Text Messaging for Social Inclusion
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to send and receive messages using voice-to-text functionality so that I can maintain social connections with my family and friends without the frustration of typing.
